    • asymmetricEncrypt

      public static String asymmetricEncrypt​(PublicKey publicKey, PrivateKey privateKey, String message, int mode) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, UnsupportedEncodingException, IllegalBlockSizeException, BadPaddingException
      For a given key pair and message, encrypt and return the message using either the public or private key depending on the mode chosen. Encryption uses the RSA algorithm in ECB mode with PKCS1Padding.
      Throws:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      UnsupportedEncodingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      BadPaddingException

    • decrypt

      public static String decrypt​(PublicKey publicKey, PrivateKey privateKey, String st, int ch) throws Exception
      For a given key pair and encrypted message, decrypt and return the message using either the public or private key depending on the mode chosen. Decryption uses the RSA algorithm.
      Throws:
      Exception
